Summary: The people Bruce had met did not seem bad. For all the terrifying skills displayed, Gotham's vigilantes behaved like (and this wasn't a topic Bruce was overly familiar with), well, like family. Still, the sight of them, dressed in those suits and working so late at night, all while exchanging banter, sent a wave of disgust up his throat.
